text: Rasulera ahabanake tomara tomadera eke aparake ahbanera mata ganya karo na. Allaha taderake janena, yara tomadera madhye cupisare sare pare. Ata'eba yara tamra adesera birud'dhacarana kare, tara e bisaye satarka hoka ye, biparyaya taderake sparsa karabe athaba yantranadayaka sasti taderake grasa karabe.
